allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor lab2/main.py into modular structure with bug fixes

Split monolithic main.py into display.py, providers.py, judge.py, and a
thin main.py orchestrator. Uses a data-driven Provider dataclass to
eliminate 6 repetitive provider blocks, fixes missing imports \(Anthropic,
json\), shadowed variable names, undefined judge variable, and
double-wrapped Markdown display calls.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
